results.title: From fear to success
results.creator_credit: Phillip Martinovski, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: When Phillip Martinovski had to go to Copperfield’s senior campus, he was incredibly nervous, so much so that on the first day he spent a lot of time standing outside the gates, debating whether to ‘wag’. In the end, he threw himself him and talks about his time at Copperfield College Senior School, in the hope that he can students like him overcome their fears.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Phillip Martinovski, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Complications
results.creator_credit: Brook Tesfaye, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Brook Tesfaye was born with one complicaton - his left foot was bent. Since his parents couldn’t afford surgery in Switzerland, Brook wore plastic correcting shoes for seven years, until he finally got his foot straight. He talks about the ongoing complications of the bent foot, of the pain, discomfit and subsequent complicatons on his knee and ankle, and how he has lived his life regardless. Despite the pain, Brook is determined to continue playing soccer, a passion he can never give up. He figures that’s how life is - and everyone has their complications.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Brook Tesfaye, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

He talks about the ongoing complications of the bent foot, of the pain, discomfit and subsequent complicatons on his knee and ankle, and how he has lived his life regardless. Despite the pain, Brook is determined to continue playing soccer, a passion he can never give up. He figures that’s how life is - and everyone has their complications.

He talks about the ongoing complications of the bent foot, of the pain, discomfit and subsequent complicatons on his knee and ankle, and how he has lived his life regardless. Despite the pain, Brook is determined to continue playing soccer, a passion he can never give up. He figures that’s how life is - and everyone has their complications.

results.title: Change
results.creator_credit: Michelle Huynh, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Michelle Huynh’s high school years were peppered with having to change schools. In that, she had to adjust to a new area, and more importantly, make new friends. In time, Michelle has learnt to see the changes she dreaded so much as a good thing.

results.brief_description: Eight young people from Melbourne’s west share their stories of family, identity and the incidents that have changed their lives. Created as part of the Digital Storytelling program ‘Western stories: expressions for the future’ at ACMI.

results.title: Street kids
results.creator_credit: Dmitry Schukin, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: From Russia to Werribee, via the gangs of Los Angeles and Las Vegas, Dmitry Schukin’s story is one of redemption through art. He talks openly about the crimes of his past and the pursuits that have helped him channel all the negative into something positive and given Schukin something to fight for.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Dmitry Schukin, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: From Russia to Werribee, via the gangs of Los Angeles and Las Vegas, Dmitry Schukin’s story is one of redemption through art. He talks openly about the crimes of his past and the pursuits that have helped him channel all the negative into something positive and given Schukin something to fight for.

results.title: Ride
results.creator_credit: Matthew Hunt, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Matt Hunt talks candidly about his all-consuming addiction: riding bikes. It is an obsession that has changed the way he looks at the world, cost him physically and financially but one that he is not likely to give up soon.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Matthew Hunt, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: On a Sunday he went fishing
results.creator_credit: Sarah Mifsud, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Sarah Mifsud’s father was an avid fisherman as was his father before him. Mifsud tells of the ordinary Sunday which turned tragically extraordinary for her family and the journey to rebuild in the aftermath.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Sarah Mifsud, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Sarah Mifsud’s father was an avid fisherman as was his father before him. Mifsud tells of the ordinary Sunday which turned tragically extraordinary for her family and the journey to rebuild in the aftermath.

results.title: Life will never be the same
results.creator_credit: Amanda Jurisic, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: ‘You don’t need to jump on a plane, or go to a theme park or stay at a five star hotel to experience the beautiful things in life.’ Amanda Jurisic remembers her father’s legacy : a sense of adventure and a love of travel. The values he taught her have stayed with her, and inspired her to travel the world.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Amanda Jurisic, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

The values he taught her have stayed with her, and inspired her to travel the world.
